00011 
00012 #include "utils.h"
00013 #include <pthread.h>
00014 
00015 namespace stxxl
00016 {
00017 
00018         //#define onoff_switch Switch
00019 
00020         class onoff_switch
00021         {
00022                 pthread_mutex_t mutex;
00023                 pthread_cond_t cond;
00024                 bool _on;
00025     onoff_switch(const onoff_switch & obj);
00026     onoff_switch & operator = (const onoff_switch & obj);
00027         public:
00028                 onoff_switch (bool flag = false):_on (flag)
00029                 {
00030                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_init (&mutex, NULL));
00031                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_init (&cond, NULL));
00032                 };
00033                  ~onoff_switch ()
00034                 {
00035                         int res = pthread_mutex_trylock (&mutex);
00036 
00037                         if (res == 0 || res == EBUSY)
00038                                   stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock
00039                                                  (&mutex))
00040                                 else
00041                                   stxxl_function_error
00042                                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_destroy
00043                                                        (&mutex));
00044 
00045                           stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_destroy (&cond));
00046                 };
00047                 void on ()
00048                 {
00049                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex));
00050                         _on = true;
00051                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex));
00052                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_signal (&cond));
00053                 };
00054                 void off ()
00055                 {
00056                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex));
00057                         _on = false;
00058                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex));
00059                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_signal (&cond));
00060                 };
00061                 void wait_for_on ()
00062                 {
00063                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex));
00064                         if (!_on)
00065                                 stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_wait
00066                                                (&cond, &mutex));
00067                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex));
00068                 };
00069                 void wait_for_off ()
00070                 {
00071                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex));
00072                         if (_on)
00073                                 stxxl_nassert (pthread_cond_wait
00074                                                (&cond, &mutex));
00075                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex));
00076                 };
00077                 bool is_on ()
00078                 {
00079                         bool res;
00080                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_lock (&mutex));
00081                         res = _on;
00082                         stxxl_nassert (pthread_mutex_unlock (&mutex));
00083                         return res;
00084                 };
00085         };
00086 }
00087 
00088 #endif
